sentences.english: Carpet tool with aluminium head, 3 spray nozzles, tubes in stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 铝制地毯手扒，3个喷嘴，不锈钢管身。

sentences.english: You should scrape the ashes out from the furnace.
Elephants use their tusks to get food by digging up roots and prying bark off trees.
sentences.chinese: 非洲象用它们的长牙挖树根，扒树皮来获取食物。

sentences.english: Pan-fry chicken steaks in 2 tbsp oil until done.
sentences.chinese: 用2汤匙油将鸡扒煎至金黄熟透，上碟。

sentences.english: The prancing and pawing of each little hoof.
sentences.chinese: 在跳跃和每个小蹄扒地。

sentences.english: I had my pocket picked on the train.
The city with the second highest number of pickpockets was Rome.
sentences.chinese: 第二名最易遭扒的城市则是由罗马拿下。

sentences.english: I even wanted to strip Cassetti.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至想扒下卡塞蒂的球裤。

sentences.english: Food Suggestions: Pairs perfectly with grilled or barbequed meat, mixed salads and red fruit salads.
sentences.chinese: 与扒肉排或烤肉，拌沙拉或红色水果沙拉堪称绝配。

sentences.english: Roasted vegetables, mash potatoes, French fries.
Children scrabbled about on the floor for the coins that had been thrown to them.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在地板上扒来扒去找扔给他们的硬币。

sentences.english: Children scrabbled about on the floor for the coins that had been thrown to them.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在地板上扒来扒去找扔给他们的硬币。

sentences.english: It can be used for various aluminum alloys. Casting may be made immediately after degassing and slagging off.
sentences.chinese: 用于各种铝合金，除气后迅速扒渣，即可浇铸。

sentences.english: Braised Pork Chop with White Beans, Stewed Mutton, Kidney in Red Wine, etc.
sentences.chinese: 我们还有洋葱铁扒猪排，白豆焖猪排，炖。

sentences.english: You're in the wrong to insult the revolutionists, Mother Dust-Heap-Corner.
sentences.chinese: 你侮辱革命的人，你想错了，扒墙角旮旯的妈妈。
